title: Traffic congestion in Colombo due to SJB protest
body_lines: Roads in parts of Colombo have been blocked by a protest march organized by the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB).
In their demonstration, the main opposition is taking a stand against the conduct of the government and urging it to resign.
The protest march kicked off at 2.00 p.m. today (March 15) near the Viharamahadevi Park in Colombo.
